enhanced_by.reason: The parse method must be called to initialize the document before selectFirst can be executed.
If parsing a fragment, this method must be called to set up the context before selectFirst can be executed.
Both methods involve selecting elements based on a query, making selectNext a good candidate for asserting the behavior of selectFirst.
Both methods handle the case where no element matches the query, making expectFirst a good candidate for asserting the behavior of selectFirst.
